meanings: 실용회화-의심 · 농담 I did it just for fun.

vlive.korean: 그랬어. That's what happened. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 히히 히히
그랬어요? You did that? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
왜 그랬어? - 왜 그랬어? Why'd you do that? - Why'd you do that? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Why'd you do that? - Why'd you do that?

vlive.korean: 왜? 하려고 그랬어요? Why? Were you going to do it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Why? Were you going to do it?

vlive.korean: [#다음 이야기] 정해진이 뭐라 그랬어? [#Next episode] What did he say to you? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 적어도 난 진짜 연애중이야 #남사친이_불편해졌다 #삼각관계 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP5
vlive.english: [#Next episode] What did he say to you?

examples.korean: Some geezer called Danny did it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대니라는 이름의 어떤 남자가 그랬어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some geezer called Danny did it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You needn’t have hurried. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 서두를 필요가 없었는데[서두르지 않아도 됐을 텐데] 그랬어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You needn’t have hurried. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘I was asleep,’ she explained blearily. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “졸려서 그랬어.” 그녀가 게슴츠레한 눈으로 변명했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I was asleep,’ she explained blearily. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You ought to have come to the meeting. It was interesting. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 그 모임에 왔더라면 좋았을 걸 그랬어. 재미있었는데. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You ought to have come to the meeting. It was interesting. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’m sorry, I wasn’t thinking. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미안, 내가 생각을 못 했어[아무 생각 없이 그랬어]. (무심코 남의 기분을 상하게 했을 때 하는 말) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m sorry, I wasn’t thinking. Add to Wordbook
